content.title: <TextStyle.Yellow>Welcome to Arcadia</>
content.text:
üåø <TextStyle.LightBlue>Arcadia</> is a <TextStyle.Green>PvE Crossplay</> server for <TextStyle.White>ARK: Survival Ascended</>.

üî± Inspired by Greek mythology, focused on:
‚Ä¢ Long-term gameplay
‚Ä¢ No wipes
‚Ä¢ Quality of Life
‚Ä¢ Fair and friendly community

‚ö†Ô∏è Press <TextStyle.Orange>F1</> anytime to re-open this menu.

content.title: <TextStyle.Red>General Rules</>
content.text:
‚Ä¢ Respect all players
‚Ä¢ No harassment or toxicity
‚Ä¢ No cheating, exploits or mesh
‚Ä¢ No griefing (PvE)
‚Ä¢ Do not block spawns or resources
‚Ä¢ Do not build inside artifact caves unless allowed

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>PvE & Building</>
content.text:
‚Ä¢ Structure decay is <TextStyle.Green>ENABLED</>
‚Ä¢ Resource blocking is <TextStyle.Red>NOT allowed</>
‚Ä¢ Admin decisions are final
‚Ä¢ Be reasonable with build size

content.title: <TextStyle.LightBlue>Server Rates</>
content.text:
‚Ä¢ XP: <TextStyle.Green>x5</>
‚Ä¢ Harvesting: <TextStyle.Green>x10</>
‚Ä¢ Taming: <TextStyle.Green>x15</>
‚Ä¢ Breeding: <TextStyle.Green>Boosted</>
‚Ä¢ Maturation: <TextStyle.Green>Very Fast</>

content.title: <TextStyle.LightBlue>Other Settings</>
content.text:
‚Ä¢ Max Wild Dino: <TextStyle.Green>150</>
‚Ä¢ No Wipes
‚Ä¢ Crossplay Enabled
‚Ä¢ PvE Tribe Wars Enabled
‚Ä¢ Supply Crate Loot: <TextStyle.Green>x5</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Important Gameplay Info</>
content.text:
